cards.title: Absolute Pin
cards.description:
An absolute pin makes it impossible for the pinned piece to move. In this position the Knight on c6 is pinned to the King by the Bishop on b5. Moving the Knight is impossible, because this would expose the king

One way to escape the pin is to put another piece between the pinned piece and the King.

cards.title: Relative pin
cards.description: In a relative pin the pinned piece can move, but this is (usually) not advised. In this position White's Knight can move, but doing so would expose the Queen.
